name: Outta Hand
description:
WARNING: an unfinished mess. (at the moment) More of a demo than a game, but i've got plans to turn it into an actual prototype once the gamejam is over.

Tea time! The recipe for the perfect tea is simple: A tea bag, Water, 2 sugar cubes and   Milk! Careful tho, the train ride is bumpy. 

CONTROLS: A + D to move, LMB - pick up, RMB - rotate.

Special thanks to: Vladimir Gorobets, Vlad Ponomarev, Callum Hughes for helping me with brainstorming ideas.

First time jammin, did the entire game on my own without a team and uploaded it literally 2 seconds before the deadline, so don't be too harsh. No way in hell I could finish this in 2 days, but this is what i have so far.  Please don't be too mean, I needed more time lol

if you want to be in touch:

INSTAGRAM: NickMarkozov

YOUTUBE: NickNoobles

Things that I had no time to fix but that will be adressed in the next update:

- Resolution issues, Gameplay loopholes and other visual problems / missing elements. (and other bugs) - Actual menu/results screens. - Sounds and music. (I've got a theme song composed already, but didn't have time to put it in) - A Scoreboard and a timer. - More variety and (potentially) levels.
